snippet: A City Council committee approved a plan to solicit proposals to develop and operate a city ID card system, which would allow illegal immigrants to use banks and other services.
abstract: Los Angeles City Council approves a plan to solicit proposals from private companies to develop and operate a municipal identification card system, which would allow illegal immigrants to use banks and other services.
lead_paragraph: A City Council committee approved a plan to solicit proposals to develop and operate a city ID card system, which would allow illegal immigrants to use banks and other services.

headline.seo: L.A. Takes Step to Issuing ID Cards to Illegal Immigrants
headline.main: IDs for Illegal Immigrants Take a Step in Los Angeles
headline.print_headline: IDs for Illegal Immigrants Take a Step in Los Angeles
